TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlDesigner extends System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 的设计模式行为。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为从派生的组件设计器提供基类 。 provides a base class for designers of components that derive from . 除了从类继承的方法和功能之外 ， 还提供其他方法来支持在设计时扩展和更改关联的行为 。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the class, provides additional methods to support extending and altering the behavior of an associated at design time. 可以使用将设计器与类型相关联 。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅 [扩展设计时支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100))。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例 实现演示了如何处理 `MouseEnter` 和 `MouseLeave` 事件，如何从设计器代码在控件上绘制，以及 如何在设计时使用接口的部分来添加控件的属性。The following example implementation demonstrates handling `MouseEnter` and `MouseLeave` events, drawing on a control from designer code, and using part of the interface to add a property for the control at design time. 下面的示例代码包含一个设计器和一个与设计器关联的示例用户控件。The following sample code contains a designer and a sample user control associated with the designer. 若要生成此示例，请将示例编译为类库，将对库的引用添加到 Windows 窗体项目中，将控件添加到 "工具箱"，然后将控件的实例添加到窗体。To build this sample, compile the sample into a class library, add a reference to the library to a Windows Forms project, add the control to the Toolbox, and add an instance of the control to your form. 指向控件时，将突出显示控件外围的内部轮廓，而用于绘制轮廓的颜色对应于 `OutlineColor` 设计器已添加到为控件列出的属性的属性。When you point to the control, the inner outline of the perimeter of the control is highlighted, and the color used to draw the outline corresponds to the `OutlineColor` property that the designer has added to the properties listed for the control. 添加对 System.web 程序集的引用以编译代码示例。Add a reference to the System.Design assembly to compile the code example. [!code-cpp[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/CPP/controldesignerexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/CS/controldesignerexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/VB/controldesignerexample.vb#1)]

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AssociatedComponents As ICollection

summary.span: 获取与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of components associated with the component managed by the designer.

value.span: 与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件。

span.span: The components that are associated with the component managed by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在复制、拖动或移动操作期间要复制或移动设计器管理的组件的任何组件。This property indicates any components to copy or move along with the component managed by the designer during a copy, drag, or move operation. 如果此集合包含对当前设计模式文档中的其他组件的引用，则在复制操作过程中，这些组件将连同设计器管理的组件一起复制。If this collection contains references to other components in the current design mode document, those components will be copied along with the component managed by the designer during a copy operation. 选择设计器管理的组件时，将使用任何嵌套控件填充该集合。When the component managed by the designer is selected, this collection is filled with any nested controls. 此集合还可以包含其他组件，如工具栏按钮。This collection can also include other components, such as the buttons of a toolbar.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会导致 Windows 处理消息，并跳过控件。This method causes the message to be processed by Windows, skipping the control. 如果要阻止消息进入控件，但不希望阻止消息进入 Windows 本身，则这非常有用，因为这可能会导致生成其他消息。This is useful if you want to block the message from getting to the control, but you do not want to block it from getting to Windows itself because it can cause other messages to be generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于测试控件是否可以是特定类型的父级的父级。This method is useful for testing whether a control can be parented by a particular type of parent. 例如，控件 只能是控件的父级 。For example, controls can only be parented by controls. > [!NOTE] > 将项从 **工具箱** 拖到设计图面上时，不会调用此方法。This method is not called when an item is dragged from the **Toolbox** onto the design surface.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时 ，请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: protected bool EnableDesignMode (System.Windows.Forms.Control child, string name);
.method familyhidebysig instance bool EnableDesignMode(class System.Windows.Forms.Control child, string name) cil managed
Protected Function EnableDesignMode (child As Control, name As String) As Boolean

param.name: child
param.span: 要为其启用设计模式的子控件。

span.span: The child control for which design mode will be enabled.

param.name: name
param.span: 为最终用户公开的 名称。

span.span: The name of as exposed to the end user.

summary.span: 启用子控件的设计时功能。

span.span: Enables design time functionality for a child control.

returns.span: 如果可以启用子控件的设计时功能，则为 ；如果宿主基础结构不支持这一功能，则为 。

span.span: if the child control could be enabled for design time; if the hosting infrastructure does not support it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的子控件 `child` 是此控件设计器的控件的子控件。The child control specified by `child` is a child of this control designer's control. 子元素不会直接加入持久性，但如果它被公开为主控件的属性，则会出现这种情况。The child does not directly participate in persistence, but it will if it is exposed as a property of the main control. 请考虑像这样的控件 ：它有两个面板： `Panel1` 和 `Panel2` 。Consider a control like the : it has two panels, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 这些面板在控件上通过只读 和 属性公开 。These panels are exposed through read only and properties on the control. 控件的设计器会对 每个面板调用，从而允许在它们上放置其他组件。The control's designer calls for each panel, which allows other components to be dropped on them. 但是，为了 保存和的内容 ， 控件本身必须将面板公开为公共属性。But, in order for the contents of and to be saved, the control itself must expose the panels as public properties. 控件名称在控件设计器中必须是唯一的，但对于其他控件设计器的子级，它们不一定是唯一的。Control names must be unique within a control designer, but they are not required to be unique with respect to the children of other control designers. 若要支持此功能，宿主基础结构必须 通过站点将类公开为服务。To support this feature, the hosting infrastructure must expose the class as a service through the site.

span.span: or is .

param.name: value
param.span: 要启用对控件的拖放支持，则为 ；如果该控件不应有拖放支持，则为 。

param.span: 默认为 。

summary.span: 启用或禁用对正在设计的控件的拖放支持。

span.span: Enables or disables drag-and-drop support for the control being designed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的默认值 `false` 指定在设计时不能将控件拖到控件上。The default value of `false` specifies that a control cannot have children dragged onto it at design time. 若要在设计时允许控件作为其他控件的父级，请将其与从派生的设计器相关联 。To allow a control to parent other controls at design time, associate it with a designer that derives from .

A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，根据 `selectionType` ， 返回的对象将表示以下选择状态之一：Note that based on `selectionType`, the objects returned will represent one of these selection states: - 具有抓取手柄的完全可调整大小的选择边框;A fully resizable selection border with grab handles; - 锁定的选择边框;A locked selection border; - 单个 "隐藏" 选择 。A single 'hidden' selection .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetHitTest(valuetype System.Drawing.Point point) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetHitTest (point As Point) As Boolean
abstract member GetHitTest : System.Drawing.Point -> bool override this.GetHitTest : System.Drawing.Point -> bool

param.name: point
param.span: ，它指示屏幕坐标中单击鼠标的位置。

span.span: A indicating the position at which the mouse was clicked, in screen coordinates.

summary.span: 指示该控件是否应处理在指定点单击鼠标的操作。

span.span: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the control.

returns.span: 如果在指定点单击的操作将由该控件处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a click at the specified point is to be handled by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定在指定点上单击是否应传递到控件，而控件处于设计模式。The method determines whether a click at the specified point should be passed to the control, while the control is in design mode. 可以重写并实现此方法，使控件能够在设计时环境中接收单击。You can override and implement this method to enable your control to receive clicks in the design-time environment. > [!NOTE] > 可以将屏幕坐标中的点传递给 类的方法， 以获取相对于控件左上角的点的坐标。You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the method of the class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control. 调用方法以响应 WM_NCHITTEST 的消息，因此将在每次鼠标移动时调用此方法。The method is called in response to the WM_NCHITTEST message, so it is called on each mouse move.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void InitializeNewComponent(class System.Collections.IDictionary defaultValues) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub InitializeNewComponent (defaultValues As IDictionary)

param.name: defaultValues
param.span: 要应用到属性的默认值的名称/值字典。

summary.span: 初始化新创建的组件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写此方法。The class overrides this method. 它将查看控件的默认属性，如果类型为 `string` ，则会将此属性的值设置为组件的名称。It will look at the default property for the control and, if it is of type `string`, it will set this property's value to the name of the component. 仅当设计器已在选项服务中配置了此选项时，它才会执行此项。It only does this if the designer has been configured with this option in the options service. 此方法还将控件连接到其父对象并将其定位。This method also connects the control to its parent and positions it. 如果重写此方法，应始终调用 base。If you override this method, you should always call base.

summary.span: 在每次需要设置光标时接收调用。

span.span: Receives a call each time the cursor needs to be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法处理设置游标事件的重定向和处理。This method handles redirection and handling of the set cursor event. 如果工具箱服务选择了一个工具，则此方法将允许工具箱服务设置光标。If the toolbox service has a tool selected, this method will allow the toolbox service to set the cursor. 如果选择 UI 服务具有锁定的选择，或者控件上没有 location 属性，则将设置默认箭头光标。If the selection UI service has a locked selection, or if there is no location property on the control, the default arrow cursor will be set. 如果用户正在拖动某个组件，则将设置十字线光标。If a user is dragging a component, the crosshair cursor will be set. 否则，将设置四向箭头光标，以指示可单击并移动组件。Otherwise, a four headed arrow cursor will be set to indicate that the component can be clicked and moved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现仅检查正在设计的组件是否是控件，如果为，则 返回其父级。The default implementation simply checks to see if the component being designed is a control and if it is, returns its parent.

span.span: if the will allow snapline alignment during a drag operation when the primary drag control is over this designer; otherwise, .
The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 接口方法重写会在设计时向此设计器的组件添加一组属性。This interface method override adds a set of properties to this designer's component at design time. 此方法可添加以下可浏览的属性： `Visible` 、 `Enabled` 、 `ContextMenu` 、 `AllowDrop` 、 `Location` 、、 `Name` `Controls` 和 `Locked` 。This method adds the following browsable properties: `Visible`, `Enabled`, `ContextMenu`, `AllowDrop`, `Location`, `Name`, `Controls`, and `Locked`.

A bitwise combination of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有设计器提供组件的规则，则组件将不会获取任何 UI 服务。If no designer provides rules for a component, the component will not get any UI services.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)
abstract member WndProc : Message -> unit override this.WndProc : Message -> unit

param.name: m
param.span: 要处理的 。

span.span: The to process.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息，并可以选择将其路由到控件。

span.span: Processes Windows messages and optionally routes them to the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法对控件通常会接收的每个消息调用。This method is called for each message the control would usually receive. 这使设计器可以在将消息路由到控件之前对消息进行预处理。This allows the designer to preprocess messages before optionally routing them to the control. 若要将消息发送到控件的 方法，请 对控件的设计器调用。To send the message to the control's method, call on the control's designer. > [!NOTE] > 设计器筛选消息，因此某些消息不会发送到控件。The designer filters messages, so some messages will not be sent to the control. 例如，由设计器截获鼠标消息。For example, mouse messages are intercepted by the designer. 如果这不是你想要的行为，请改为调用 。If this is not the behavior you want, call instead. `m`作为参数传递。Pass `m` as a parameter. 或者，您可以更改或创建一个新的 以传递到控件的方法。Optionally, you can alter or create a new to pass to the control's method. 下表显示了消息流。The following table shows the flow of messages. |没有设计器Without a designer|使用设计器With a designer| |------------------------|---------------------| |USER32.DLLUSER32





USER32.DLLUSER32|USER32.DLLUSER32

`Control.Designer.` `Control.Designer.`







USER32.DLLUSER32| 设计器通过替换控件上的属性来截获消息 。The designer intercepts messages by replacing the property on the control. 通常， 指向 包含在控件内的。Usually, points to the contained within the control. 在设计时，设计器会将其替换为它自己的窗口目标，并缓存原始值。During design time, the designer replaces this with its own window target, and caches the original value.
